summary: Sahibinden.com style HomeFeed features tested successfully. All 11 requested features are working correctly: Filter Panel (Category, Platform), Clear Filters, Grid/List View Toggle, Sorting (En Yeni, Bütçe High→Low), Search, Job Cards with all elements, Favorites toggle, and Apply Modal.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sahibinden.com style HomeFeed is fully functional. Key data-testid attributes: 'search-input', 'sort-select', 'view-grid-btn', 'view-list-btn', 'jobs-feed', 'job-card-{job_id}', 'apply-btn-{job_id}', 'application-modal', 'application-message-input', 'submit-application-btn'. Filter sections are collapsible (Kategori, Platform, Bütçe Aralığı, Konum). Budget filter has predefined ranges and custom min/max inputs.

filter_panel_category.details: Clicking 'Ürün Tanıtımı' category filters jobs from 6 to 3. 'Tüm Kategoriler' shows all jobs.

filter_panel_platform.details: Instagram filter: 6→5 jobs. TikTok filter: 6→2 jobs. Platform section is collapsible with icons.

clear_filters_button.details: 'Temizle' button clears all filters and restores full job list (3→6 jobs after clear)

view_mode_grid.details: Grid view shows 3 columns (xl:grid-cols-3). Grid button has bg-fuchsia-500 when active.

view_mode_list.details: List view shows jobs in row format with price on right side. Uses space-y-3 layout.

sorting_newest.details: Sort dropdown defaults to 'newest'. Jobs sorted by created_at descending.

sorting_budget_high_to_low.details: Selecting 'budget_high' sorts jobs by budget descending (10,000₺ first)

search_filter.details: Searching 'API' filters jobs to 2 results. Search works on title/description/brand.

job_cards_elements.details: Job cards show: category tag (fuchsia), platform tags (blue), price (green), 'Başvur' button, heart icon

favorites_toggle.details: Heart icon toggles favorite state. Red filled heart = favorited, gray outline = not favorited.

apply_modal.details: Clicking 'Başvur' opens modal with job details, message textarea, and 'Başvuru Gönder' button

budget_range_filter.details: Budget section has predefined ranges (₺0-1000, ₺1000-5000, etc.) and custom min/max inputs

test_flow: 2. Navigate to /home - verify HomeFeed loads with 6 jobs
3. Verify Grid view is default (3 columns, grid button active)
4. Click List view button - verify layout changes to rows with price on right
5. Click Grid view button - verify layout returns to 3 columns
6. Change sort to 'Bütçe (Yüksek → Düşük)' - verify jobs sorted by budget
7. Type 'API' in search - verify 2 jobs shown
8. Clear search - verify all 6 jobs shown
9. Click 'Ürün Tanıtımı' category - verify 3 jobs shown
11. Expand Platform section, click 'instagram' - verify 5 jobs shown
13. Expand Budget section, click '₺5.000 - ₺10.000' - verify filter applied
14. Click 'Başvur' button - verify modal opens with job details
15. Verify modal has message input and submit button
16. Close modal - verify it closes properly

ui_observations.design_quality: Excellent - Dark theme with fuchsia/cyan gradient accents matches sahibinden.com style
ui_observations.filter_panel: Left sidebar with collapsible sections, clear visual hierarchy
ui_observations.job_cards: Clean card design with category/platform tags, price prominently displayed
ui_observations.responsive: Grid adapts from 1 to 3 columns based on screen size
ui_observations.accessibility: All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
